title: About
content:
Predrag Lazic #  Predrag wanted to be a pilot as a kid, then his eyesight went below 20/20. Since then his aspiration was to become an Astronaut.
In modern times his preference has been using technology to focus on open source software and the well being around an increasing global population.

title: Games
content: Art 1  #

title: Open Source
content: Open Source #

title: Rigs
content: Blender Rigs #  Rodent Cup Misfit Quad Mesh Jellybean  Boomerang Claw Monkey Propeller Umbrella  Aquatic Monster Hand Pony Orange Robot Amphibian Oxfox

title: LoD
content: Lord of Dice was a mobile card strategy game, I haven’t played it in years but it was brought up in a conversation on the internet. There’s hardly any youtube videos about it and the .apk is hard to find. Nor is there enough space on my mobile device to use it. It’s sort of in a tie with how much time it takes where it equals Ragnarok Online. Some of my best memories are mmorpgs.

title: Distro
content: There’s a few rig releases in the works, enjoy!

title: Distro
content: My oh my the last month has been busy, a lot less sleep and worthwhile drawing. In the midsts of that ended up having a operating system burn out. Not to worry though, it’s been replaced. Now it’s on a Debian based system without any integration issue. My first one actually, rather fascinating moving from an Aur base to something else.

title: Chroma Corps
content: Our pal Sinix is hosting Chroma Corps again this year, a world building exercise for a mech academy. All cadets are live ==> https://youtu.be/aH7fZ-iBZqk

title: Drawpile
content: There’s a new release of Drawpile out as of three days ago, a free collaborative online drawing platform. https://drawpile.net

title: Corrupted Hard Drive
content: A decade old external hard drive went skynet yesterday and lost hundreds of gigabityes of data. No biggie since backups of backups are commonplace now. Everything is fine and the HD has been formatted to exFat which has no file size limit. Remember to do thorough backups!

title: Suzume No Tojimari
content: Currently the movie so aptly named Suzume No Tojimari is playing in my whereabouts and I had the fortune to view it in a theatre. To my thoughts it was going to be only a few people, anime weebs with asthma and myself. As it turns out the venue was packed and in hindsight all the better for it. It was funny, heartwarming, depressing and much, much more. If you get a chance to see it on a large screen it gets thumbs up for any anime fan. 9/10

title: Spring
content: There’s a flutter of noises from animals mingling, plants are growing and rain replaces snow. It’s a great time to homestead & eat lots.

title: Heart of Winter
content: It just got really cold here, had the sniffles for a few days.

title: Another Cowl
content: Infinity Wars the Card Game had another successful kickstarter. To learn more about its revival visit Link in post.

title: Normie Tier
content: Back to reality.

title: Frostbite
content: Locked myself in for the past month for new years, it was great. Just an all around healing and sleeping and eating awesome time as temperatures dropped 20 below 0 celsius.

title: Ēostre
content: Slumber.

title: N.Y Resolution
content: Digitise all vinyl in storage.

title: First Snow
content: It’s weird when December hits and no snow in sight, no jingle bell or story to tell. Eggnog though, liquid ice cream. Have a nice festive season!

title: Yule time
content: Pass the pudding please, never get enough of sourdough rye in the wool. Holden bottleneck swept up by the wear sunscreen.

title: Hangar
content: Saw some squeegy kids cleaning windows in a place, an apartment complex on a visit to the city. Living on the outskirts makes a world of difference, remembering the night life and how different it is to be awake without sun for years.

title: 毒薬
content: Easy fallen vertigo; virtuous blight, but not without temper that once stood so still.

title: Farewell
content: After using KDE desktop environment for a few years I have overwrote the OS with Openbox. A messy few days though not a bad breakup, happy Halloween!

title: Infinity Wars Classic
content: A kickstarter just ended for one of my all time favourite card games. Link is in the post, may the triforce be with you.

title: Phonograph
content: All’s turpentine, black as soot. Sombre bellows sirens speaks, from birch to birch then again.

title: Chokeberries & Acorns
content: Gonna work towards scripts and storyboards to wittle down time, efficiency and pipeline.

title: End of Summer
content: Time to be a cake-a-holic, can’t wait for cheese cake during winter. The trees have started turning colour and a bunch are still growing berries.

title: Humidity
content: It’s been sunny around this time of year, food shortages are about to happen. Stock up on supply unless the whole starving artist thing is in.

title: Upload
content: There’s been some rigs added to the repo, all are compatible with 2.8x and up. Please check ‘em out!

title: Chromarinara
content: Chroma Corps 2022 has started –> Link

title: Highway of Information
content: The network was down yesterday for a day, really brings life into perspective. People connected to the web 24/7 must have a tough time staying grounded.

title: Battery
content: Bought a used solar cell, small and portable. Also saw a dead rodent earlier, under a bridge.

title: Slice of Life
content: User interface is sorely off in much of open source, same with backwards compatibility. Jamming a Snes cartridge into a n64.

title: Candles
content: Since electric outages are starting to happen there’s a bunch of candles about the house here. First world problems, getting supplies and stuff.

title: Gingerbread Fingers
content: Took a walk through a forest, saw almost no one. Scrounging about town for bakeries and dessert.

title: The Earth Blushes in Flowers
content: Flower was an awesome video game.

title: Wear Sun Screen!
content: Since Summer is about to begin the ceremony is in. It’ll be a once in a lifetime opportunity, city streets are best not get isolated in.

title: Onion Skins Have Pigment
content: The machinery has been overheating a lot, good thing there’s an internal thermometer. It usually taps out at around 70 degrees celsius. Let’s paint some eggs!

title: Bzzt
content: Looking into alternative tech providers, spring cleaning!

title: Chlorophyll
content: Attempted homemade nutella with peanuts, cocoa powder and honey once. Bad idea, thumbs up for culinary disasters.

title: Seasons
content: Waking up to a foot of snow, untouched without visitors in the night. The end of winter is bitter and sweet since the animals are about and cold blistering hollow no more.

title: Workaholism
content: X-mas celebrations are coming to a close & waking up from a long hangover. Yes, it is January 31st and it’s dawning on everyone that life has to go on.

title: Logic
content: Completed a 1st logic network & almost ready to step into a new sculpture.
Happy New Year!

title: CC-0
content: Updated licensing info on music 4 videos.

title: Avalanche
content: If not for the absence of snow right now would be a-ok. Making deformations on a primate.

title: Acme
content: Comments have been removed on account of making website ugly.
Comms are up.

title: Test Phase Sum Up
content: Map clear, Starship launch at the ready.

title: Reference
content: From now on this here subset in recess has dedication outlined to keeping up to date on personal projects, w.i.ps and so on.

title: Site is Live!
content: Site is Live!
